org.livingdoc.repositories.cache

Class CacheHelper

  • org.livingdoc.repositories.cache.CacheHelper

  • public class CacheHelper

    The CacheHelper helps caching documents and retrieving the cached documents.

    The repositories that want to use caching can use this helper to implement the caching.

        The CacheHelper helps caching documents and retrieving the cached documents.

        The repositories that want to use caching can use this helper to implement the caching.

    • Method Detail

      • cacheInputStream

        public void cacheInputStream(@NotNull
                             java.io.InputStream inputStream,
                             @NotNull
                             java.nio.file.Path path)

        Caches the given input stream to a file under the given path. The input stream is closed.

        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • getCacheInputStream

        @NotNull
public java.io.InputStream getCacheInputStream(@NotNull
                                                        java.nio.file.Path path)

        Gets the cached object from the path and returns the input stream.

        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • isCached

        public boolean isCached(@NotNull
                        java.nio.file.Path path)

        Checks whether a file at the given path exists. Assumes the file is a cached document.

        Returns:
        true if there is a file. Otherwise false.

      • hasActiveNetwork

        public boolean hasActiveNetwork(@NotNull
                                java.lang.String url)

        Checks whether an active connection to the given url exists.

        Returns:
        false if url is malformed or no connection is possible, true otherwise
